channel.title: Prospect of a union
channel.description:
A first-hand account of the founding of the United States, described through the correspondence of John and Abigail Adams.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Battle of Bunker Hill
item.description: This program presents dramatic readings from the correspondence between John and Abigail Adams.
item.dc:creator: Spiro, Elizabeth
item.dc:subject: NAEB Region I: The Northeast
